author: Dawn Lim
title: Blackstone Takes Minority Stake in Kohlberg & Co.
text:
Blackstone Group LP, through its Strategic Capital Holdings Fund, has acquired a minority stake in Kohlberg & Co., a private-equity firm specializing in middle-market investing.
Kohlberg will use money from the transaction primarily to finance commitments that the firmâ€™s principals make to funds they manage for investors, according to people familiar with the matter. No sales proceeds will be used to cash out executives, the people said.
